Magic to turn OAS into GUI..message: Magic to turn OAS into GUI.

cmn.tagline.message: Magic to turn OAS into GUI.

cmn.features.01.body.message: No need to write any frontend-matter codes.

cmn.features.02.body.message: Viron is an open-source software, which grants anyone to edit, study, distribute and contribute to it for free.

cmn.features.03.body.message: Viron works on all modern browsers and offers responsive UI. It also supports light and dark modes with 24+ color themes.

cmn.features.04.body.message: What a OAS can describe is what Viron can display on a screen. Viron grows as OAS does.
